abstract: Charles O. Prince III has resigned from Citigroup, and Robert E. Rubin has taken the reins as chairman. But who’s that interim figure in the chief executive’s seat?
lead_paragraph: Charles O. Prince III has resigned from Citigroup, and Robert E. Rubin has taken the reins as chairman. But who’s that interim figure in the chief executive’s seat?

headline.main: Citi Watch: Meet the Interim C.E.O.
